author: Barbara Serra
title: UK vs Italy: A tale of two lockdowns
description: Britons are still adjusting to the idea of social distancing, while Italians have faced much more severe measures.
content:
London, United Kingdom - A word's meaning can sometimes get lost in translation as it crosses borders.
That seems to be happening to the term "lockdown". About one-third of the world's population has now had its movement restricted in the fight against coron… [+4626 chars]
